RelatedSentence: In a first ever , the US government has charged 5 officers of the China 's People 's Liberation Army with criminal charges for stealing trade secrets from US companies .
The US Attorney General , Eric Holder has released the indictment with 31 charges .
The indictment list also contains the names of five companies whose secrets relating to pricing , strategy , plant designs or cost were allegedly .
